post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
We are planning to have a first get-together meeting so that we can have a chance to introduce each other. Also, we will discuss about an immediate event as well.

The following place and time are set tentatively so please feel free to join (you can register to be a member at the door if you have not applied yet).

Sushi and drink will be served. Also, let me know if you need a ride.

===the following===
PLACE: 한울연합교회, 260 High Park Ave. (High Park & Annette)
DATE & TIME: 3월 6일(목) 저녁 7:00

Should any changes occur, I will notify. Otherwise, the above schedule will remain in effect.
post.title: 2003년 COSKA 교육팀 자원봉사자 meeting
